title: Collaborative Learning-Based Math Problem-Solving Strategies Using Flip Charts

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Flipped chart creation using digital devices (tablets/laptops) combined with offline collaborative activities

learning_goals: Learners can visualize and structure mathematical problems using flip charts and then explain the solution process through collaborative learning.
Learners can improve flip chart-based problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can achieve a performance improvement of at least 60% based on the N-Gain score.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
